member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.AnonymousOnly
member.summary: Cache enabled only for requests when Thread.CurrentPrincipal is not set

member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.MustRevalidate
member.summary: Corresponds to MustRevalidate HTTP header - indicates whether the origin server requires revalidation of a cache entry on any subsequent use when the cache entry becomes stale

member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.ExcludeQueryStringFromCacheKey
member.summary: Do not vary cache by querystring values

member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.ServerTimeSpan
member.summary: How long response should be cached on the server side (in seconds)

member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.ClientTimeSpan
member.summary: Corresponds to CacheControl MaxAge HTTP header (in seconds)

member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.SharedTimeSpan
member.summary: Corresponds to CacheControl Shared MaxAge HTTP header (in seconds)

member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.NoCache
member.summary: Corresponds to CacheControl NoCache HTTP header

member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.Private
member.summary: Corresponds to CacheControl Private HTTP header. Response can be cached by browser but not by intermediary cache

member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.CacheKeyGenerator
member.summary: Class used to generate caching keys

member.name: P:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.CacheOutputAttribute.MediaType
member.summary: If set to something else than an empty string, this value will always be used for the Content-Type header, regardless of content negotiation.

member.name: M:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.TimeAttributes.CacheOutputUntilThisMonthAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Cache item until absolute expiration THIS YEAR / THIS MONTH / 01 @ 17h45

member.name: M:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.TimeAttributes.CacheOutputUntilThisYearAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Cache item until absolute expiration THIS YEAR / 01 / 01 @ 17h45

member.name: M:WebApi.OutputCache.V2.TimeAttributes.CacheOutputUntilToday.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Cache item until absolute expiration today @ 17h45
